ServicesPage.title: SELECT YOUR SERVICE
ServicesPage.subtitle: Lingo has plenty of options to ensure your business has everything for success!

translation.name: Translation
translation.description: This service includes general language translations for non-technical books, articles, brochures, radio and TV commercials, slogans, blog posts, etc.

audioProduction.name: Audio Productions
audioProduction.description: We record and master audiobooks as well as other projects requiring voice-overs, such as advertisements, and motion pictures.

editing.name: Editing
editing.description: Our editing process goes beyond correcting grammar and spelling errors. We also improve language flow, structure, organization, and readability of your texts.

printing.name: Printing
printing.description: Book and manual printing are some of our specialties. We also offer shipping options at competitive prices.

ghostwriting.name: Ghostwriting
ghostwriting.description: This service is dedicated to book writing, both technical and non-technical.

interpretation.name: Interpretation
interpretation.description: We offer expert interpretation services around the world, both remotely and in-person.

certification.name: Certification
certification.description: We provide certification services in Portugal, USA, Ireland, UK, and Tunisia.

technicalWriting.name: Technical Writing
technicalWriting.description: Our expertise includes essay writing, scientific articles, manuals, and contracts.

translation.name: Translation
translation.description: We break language barriers, making global content marketing easy. Lingo offers 20 languages and counting, helping you expand your business worldwide. Lingo handles everything from simple translations to diverse content like books, articles, brochures, ads, slogans, and blogs.

audioProduction.name: Audio Productions
audioProduction.description: We understand that many people do not have the patience to stay buried in a book. Your one-stop solution is Lingo. Lingo can help you handle any of your audio production projects. Is it an audiobook, audio mastering, audio recording, or voice-over projects such as ads or movies? Lingo does it all.

editing.name: Editing
editing.description: Our team is here to ensure your content shines, resonates, and leaves a lasting impression worldwide. We refine academic papers, business reports, creative writing, marketing content, and more. Trust us to polish your words and elevate your message to new heights.

printing.name: Printing
printing.description: Discover the magic of our printing services, where your words find a home in beautifully crafted pages. We bring your stories to life with precision and care. With top-of-the-line printing technology and a commitment to quality, your books will inspire readers and stand the test of time.

ghostwriting.name: Ghostwriting
ghostwriting.description: Lingo understands how long you have had your vision of writing that book. You feel like it may remain a mirage, but with our team of efficient writers, it is time for you to take that step with us and make your dreams come true. Fiction or non-fiction, make it clear to us, and let us do the magic!

interpretation.name: Interpretation
interpretation.description: Embrace seamless communication across languages with our expert interpretation services. Whether it's conferences, business meetings, legal proceedings, or cultural events, we bridge the language gap, ensuring meaningful exchanges between diverse audiences.

certification.name: Certification
certification.description: Ensure the authenticity of your essential documents with our reliable certification services. From legal contracts to official reports and sensitive paperwork, our expert team meticulously verifies and validates each document.

technicalWriting.name: Technical Writing
technicalWriting.description: Our skilled team transforms intricate concepts into clear, user-friendly content that resonates with your target audience. From user manuals and product guides to software documentation and technical reports, we bring simplicity to complexity.

Qualities.title: QUALITIES
Qualities.subtitle: THAT MAKES US BETTER THAN OTHER SERVICES

human.title: HUMAN QUALITY
human.intro: Lingo delivers every project with the highest level of accuracy by combining technological excellence and human expertise.

fast.title: FAST TURNAROUND
fast.intro: We ensure on-time project delivery with best-in-class procedures that make project tracking simple for you at every stage.

cost.title: COST EFFECTIVE
cost.intro: We provide affordable and high-quality services tailored to your business needs.

team.title: QUALIFIED TEAM
team.intro: We provide excellent translation services worldwide through a team of over 20 multilingual professionals.

Reviews.title: Reviews
Reviews.subtitle: They are just some of those who have trusted our services. Project delivered, happy customer with Lingo.
Reviews.quote: Hi, my name is Onório Cutane. I am a professional writer versed in Christian literature and have written over 10 books that have been translated from Portuguese into English, French, and Spanish, which are available in most major platforms and digital libraries all over the world. Working with the Lingo team has been an extraordinary journey. The editors, translators, and review team are highly professional and have made my work easy. It’s motivating to work with this ever-present and caring team, who care about nothing less than the quality of our products (books) to suit an international standard. Therefore, as a professional writer who cares about quality products, I recommend that every writer who also wishes to be successful work with the Lingo team. I haven’t been disappointed working with this company; therefore, I think you won´t either.

Affiliates.title: Affiliates
Affiliates.subtitle: Collaborating for Mutual Success: The Power of Our Affiliate Partnerships

itemOne.title: Foundation
itemOne.description: Lingo serves as a resource platform for brands looking to advance their prospects and reach a large audience by leveraging the vast potentials of machine intelligence and human expertise. Our portfolio of services include translation, interpretation, ghostwriting, audio production, technical writing, editing, certification, and printing. We understand the need for perfection, which is why we are committed to providing quality services on every project.

itemTwo.title: Workflow
itemTwo.description: Lingo's ability to help businesses cut down on project management hours is one of its many remarkable features. As proof of our dedication, we have assembled a team of experienced professionals to ensure that your business goals are met. You can also track your projects online from anywhere, at any time.

itemThree.title: Locations
itemThree.description: We currently have offices in Warsaw (Poland), Tunis (Tunisia), Porto (Portugal), Wilmington, Delaware (USA), and Washington DC. (USA), Montreal, Toronto (Canada), Dublin (Ireland), and London (UK).

itemFour.title: Languages
itemFour.description: We offer language services in English, French, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, German, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Czech, Slovak, Turkish, Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, Indonesian, Russian, Dutch, and Hindi.

Security.title: PROTECTION OF YOUR DATA AND CONTENT IS A TOP PRIORITY AT LINGO COMMUNICATIONS
Security.intro: All Lingo servers are located in a highly secure, non-disclosed location. All content downloaded on the Lingo platform is maintained within Lingo’s encrypted database library called “crypto-js”:

items.one: Crypto-js is a library in javascript complete with cryptographic functions including encryption, decryption, and hashing functions.
items.two: Crypto-js is licensed under the MIT license.
items.three: Crypto-js is a growing collection of standard and secure cryptographic algorithms implemented in JavaScript using best practices and patterns.

Security.outro: All document encryption will only be lifted for the specific Lingo staff member assigned to each client. No other Lingo personnel will have access to any encrypted client file. For any questions regarding Lingo’s data and content security procedures, please contact us at

one.title: What is Lingo?
one.moreInfo: Lingo is a document and translating company. We transform your ideas and creative process into books, manuals, and manuscripts in 20 different languages. Among the services we provide are translation, ghostwriting, and audio book production. Other services include technical writing, document certification, printing, and interpretation.

two.title: Why choose Lingo?
two.moreInfo: We provide more languages than other translation firms. More than that, we take pride in the sheer excellence and perfection with which we complete each task. You can also get expert advice from our in-house business intelligence and development team.

three.title: How can Lingo improve my business?
three.moreInfo: Our editing and ghostwriting services guarantee you error-free and grammatically sound content, while our translation service helps you reach new audiences around the world. Our audio services also give people a more practical way to listen to your content in various languages. Every time we start a learning journey, Lingo takes all of these things into account. It's time to focus on other areas of your business while Lingo handles the creative side.

four.title: What languages are available?
four.moreInfo: We currently offer support in 20 languages including, English, French, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, German, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Czech, Slovak, Turkish, Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, Indonesian, Russian, Dutch, and Hindi.

five.title: I need a certified document. Where do you offer this service?
five.moreInfo: We are able to provide this service in the following countries: Portugal, the USA, Ireland, the UK, and Tunisia.

six.title: How is the cost calculated?
six.moreInfo: All our services are priced differently. Translation, editing, ghostwriting, technical writing, and audio production services are priced per word. Our printing services are charged per page, while document certification and interpretation vary based on the needs of our clients. Also, revisions are billed on an hourly basis.

seven.title: What is the difference between Standard and Technical Translation/Editing/Writing?
seven.moreInfo: Our Standard creative services deal with any piece of work considered non-technical, including website content, articles, non-technical books, etc. If you need us to help you with a more complex document, that’s where our technical services come in handy! We can help you with anything from legal contracts, thesis, and instruction manuals here.

eight.title: When can I expect my project to be delivered?
eight.moreInfo: The deadline for your order will depend on the service you selected and the word count. Projects up to 5K words have a deadline of 1-2 days, and projects can range from 3-4 days (15K words) and 10+ days for projects with more than 40K words. The exact due date will be determined after your order is confirmed, and it will be sent to you via email. You can also access “my purchases” and check the status of your order, which is updated at the end of every business day.

nine.title: My project was finalized, but I want to request revisions. What do I do?
nine.moreInfo: You may request it by responding to the email you received with your final draft. The Project Manager will then arrange a free 30-min consultation for revisions. Please keep in mind that any additional revisions will have an extra cost.

ten.title: What differences exist between the standard and premium printing?
ten.moreInfo: Our standard printing services are tailored to meet your basic needs. The premium package comes with a personalized cover feature.
